Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Handling all administration work at the factory
              
              -	Making business letters to customers, vendors, authority
              
              -	Making production and warehouse control reports in English and Vietnamese for group companies or vendors
              
              -	Understanding about accounting pratice is a plus
              
              -	Working time: Monday to Friday, 8:00 – 17:00
              
              -	Working location: Dau Giay Industrial Park - Dong Nai province
              
              -	Business trip: No
              
              -	Working environment: small and friendly, within 10 people
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * REQUIREMENTS
              
              -	Level: Assistant Manager
              
              -	Gender: female
              
              -	Age: 25-35y
              
              -	Education: college degree or above
              
              -	Strong communication skills
              
              -	Competent in using MS Word, MS Excel
              
              -	Language: Advanced English (TOEIC 780 or equivalent)
              
              -	Experience: at least 2 year experience in required position, however experience in renewable energy is not required
              
              -	Self-arrangment of commuting (commuting bus is not available so candidate living near the factory is preferred)
              
              -	Recruitment process: 2 rounds including interview and writing test
              
              -	CV in English with latest picture
              

              * BENEFITS
              
              -	Monthly salary of VND15,000,000 plus 13th month salary
              
              -	Bonus depending on company business results
              
              -	Overtime allowance
              
              -	All welfare allowances according to Vietnam Labor Law
              
              -	Premium health care plan
              
              -	Company mobile phone subsidization
              
              -	Lunch allowance
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
